contest-event.event-date:
April 29, 1899 D Berkhamsted Contest
Berkhamsted Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
berkhamsted-contest
Test Piece Contest
Songs of the Sea
Berkhamsted, Hertfordshire 1st prize £6, 2nd prize £4, 3rd prize £2, 4th prize £1. March contest 1st(£1) Luton Red Cross, 2nd prize (10s.) divided between Gravesend and Watford L and N W Rly, Each band played two selections, one being "Tom Bowling" 10 bands competed.
April 11, 2012, 2:28 p.m. July 27, 2019, 12:48 p.m.
1 Luton Band R. H. Cooper
2 Hazell's Printing Works John Thomas Ogden
3 Long Buckby Town Silver Arthur Muddiman
4 Watford Willie Greenwood
Unknown Result Northampton Town James Hager
Unknown Result St. Albans City H. Cannon
Unknown Result Dunstable Borough John Thomas Ogden
Unknown Result St Alban's Abbey Randolph Ryan
Unknown Result Denham Brass W. J. Douglas Sherriff
Unknown Result Gravesend Borough Band R. J. Marke
